casebody.data:
IN RE: SKINNER 277A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 13, 2016 Ira Braswell, IV, Attorney at Law, for Skinner, Mark. Jenna F. Butler, Attorney at Law, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Clark, Nancy Bass, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 8th of September 2016 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of September 2016."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 26th day of October 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
